document.heading: Blue and White Marching Machine Way Designation Act of 2024
To symbolically designate A Street, NE, between North Carolina Avenue, NE, and 17th Street, NE, as Blue and White Marching Machine Way.

history.summary: BILL SUMMARY - As introduced Bill 25-559 would symbolically designate A Street, N.E., between 13th Street, N.E. and 16th Street, N.E., as Blue and White Marching Machine Way.

document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Blue and White Marching Machine Way Designation Act of 2024".

section.text: Pursuant to sections 401, 403a, and 423 of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.01, 9-204.03a, and 9-204.23), and 17th Street, NE, as "Blue White Marching Machine Way".

codify:street-designation-anno.action: the Council symbolically designates A Street, NE, between North Carolina Avenue, NE, and 17th Street, NE, as "Blue and White Marching Machine Way

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement in the committee report as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code § 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto) and a 30-day period of congressional review as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code § 1-206.02(c)(1)).
